mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event_log (event_id, correlation_id, event_type, event_version, source, payload, processed, timestamp) VALUES (#{eventId,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.UUIDTypeHandler}, #{correlationId,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.UUIDTypeHandler}, #{eventType}, #{eventVersion}, #{source}, #{payload}, COALESCE(#{processed}, false), COALESCE(#{timestamp}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM event_log WHERE event_id = #{eventId,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.UUIDTypeHandler})
mapper.update: UPDATE event_log SET processed = true, processed_at = COALESCE(#{processedAt}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) WHERE event_id = #{eventId,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.UUIDTypeHandler}
